title: Electric Sanitation Car
content: Designed for sanitation purposes, the Electric Sanitation Car from Red Shift features a fully electric power source, a digital dashboard, robust build, luxury instrument panel, and high-grade seats tailored for sanitation workers' comfort and safety.

title: Electric Express Car
content: Configured for swift express transportation, the Electric Express Car from Red Shift boasts a sleek design, advanced safety features, luxurious interiors, and amenities catering specifically to express delivery needs.

title: Model 110
content: The Model 110 from Red Shift is a versatile three-wheeler vehicle accommodating up to 2 persons, offering fuel options in electric and gasoline, and featuring advanced technology, safety features, and high-grade leather seats.

title: Model 125
content: The Model 125 from Red Shift is designed to accommodate up to 5 persons, offering fuel options in electric and gasoline, and featuring spacious interiors, advanced safety features, and luxury amenities for a comfortable ride.

title: Model 150
content: The Model 150 from Red Shift is built to accommodate up to 6 persons, offering fuel options in electric and gasoline, and featuring a modern design, advanced safety features, and ample seating capacity.
